name: gemini-ntfy
description: Sends notifications via ntfy.sh when the agent needs attention or finishes.

settings.name: Ntfy Topic
settings.description: The ntfy topic to send notifications to. IMPORTANT: ntfy.sh topics are public by default; treat your topic name like a password (e.g., use a long random string).

settings.name: Ntfy ID
settings.description: Unique ID for updating/replacing notifications (defaults to system hostname).

settings.name: Click Action
settings.description: The URL or intent to open when the notification is clicked (defaults to opening Termux on Android).

author: Chen Ye
